patthana23.54:1.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ namaggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.54:2.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ namaggahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.54:3.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ namaggādhipatiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
